chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 is having an issue:
hello, 
I bought an I PHONE 13 from your website. The regulation was done well. The package was shipped on the 14/05, but since then, there has been no news about the package. The logistics company does not know where the package is located. We need to return our old phone before June 2nd. As long as I don't receive my order, I won't be able to proceed with the return. Thank you for telling me how this will go? When can I expect my new purchase? Do you have a way to contact the logistics company? 

Best regards,
Thank you for your help,

Hello!

The tracking status of this order has not changed in 4 business days and is now considered lost as per Back Market delivery policy. We have requested the Back Market certificate of non-receipt and picture of the customers ID to arrange a refund or a replacement.
 
Once all the paperwork has been gathered we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents

If at any point the delivery begins to move again a refund will not be issued and the order is considered to be late.

Best regards,
Aina - Back Market

Dear ecomobile

Parcel received. Have a nice day !

Regards,
Suzie from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of this. Thank you!

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile
